verbs.description: energize (third-person singular simple present energizes, present participle energizing, simple past and past participle energized)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To supply with energy, especially electricity; to turn on power to (something).
examples: Whenever we energize that circuit we blow a fuse.

entries.meaning: (intransitive, obsolete) To use strength in action; to act or operate with force or vigor; to act in producing an effect.
